This button toggles play and pause

The min number of songs determines the amount of songs you will hear when the algorithm finds the songs you like. The lower this number, the less songs you will hear when the algorithm finds the songs you like. At 1, your favorite song will play a lot after a while until you use the menu in the app bar to reset or lower the probabilities.
Enter a positive number for Min Number of Songs

The mods (1-100) determine how much weight the algorithm uses when the thumb up, thumb down, or skip button are tapped or held down. 1 makes the smallest change and 100 makes the largest change. When Min number of songs is 1 and mod up is 100, a song will take the least number of taps to play a lot. When mod down is 1, songs will take a lot of taps until you do not hear them as often.
